title: Episode #46: Mastery With Robert Greene
description: In today's podcast we talk to New York Times Bestselling author Robert Greene about his new book Mastery. We discuss what it takes to become a master in any domain or field in life and the common path that great men like da Vinci, Darwin, and Mozart tred to achieve greatness.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
